review_data.title: Great Soba Noodle Bowl
review_data.content: I enjoy the atmosphere and especially the Sobad noodle salad and the Pelmenis are great! I also enjoy the homemade kombicja!

review_data.title: This is my favourite place in Zurich
review_data.content: This is my favourite place to enjoy a delicious and healthy meal in Zurich! The soups are amazing and also the bowls/ salads! The menu changes regularly and you will always find a delicious option- also vegetarian/vegan & sugar-free options! This is my “go-to” place...More

review_data.title: Suppenqualität zum Besten
review_data.content: Akurate Suppenzubereitung mit Details für Gewürzbeilagen. Effiziente und angenehm freundliche Bedienung!

review_data.title: Feine Suppe

review_data.title: Soup
review_data.content: The soups are a great nutritious fast food. I would eat a quick bite here more offen if it wasn't so darn expensive.

review_data.title: Daily fresh made soups to go or to enjoy at the restaurant
review_data.content: Since a couple of years I'm visiting this place a appr. 5 times every month and they keep on surpassing my expectations. The quality of the fresh products used is absolutely fantastic. The taste of the soups is outstanding, a must go if you like...More

review_data.title: Real food
review_data.content: Great soups and sandwiches but the menu needs a a bit of variety. Even though the place is not cheap, the portions are good and their homemade ice creams ( try the chocolate one) is to die for! The staff is friendly and the decor...More

review_data.title: Nice soups, salads ond sandwiches
review_data.content: Nice range of food. However, the salads are a bit too small for lunch. They also have a nice range of drinks and fruit bars.

review_data.title: Great food, atmosphere and management
review_data.content: So refreshing. Food that is made with great care. The owner is so conscientious. Their slogan 'Eat Healthy, be Happy' is so true. I've taken my wife and business colleagues here. We feel rejuvenated with the bright, clean atmosphere.

review_data.title: Mittagessen Take-Away ok
review_data.content: Salatbuffet ist super. Frisch und gute Auswahl. Die Suppen etwas langweilig, meistens die gleichen und zu teuer. Die Bagels mit...More

review_data.title: Если торопитесь
review_data.content: Неплохое место, если находитесь рядом и торопитесь. Можно быстро перекусить очень вкусного супа, а также взять с собой на вынос....More

review_data.title: Fresh food, nice take-away offering
review_data.content: One of the few places in the area where you can get a take-away lunch at reasonable prices. Meals are always from fresh ingredients and of good quality. This has become one of my favourites in the area.

review_data.title: Surprise!
review_data.content: Who'd have thought that a bowl of soup could be a whole meal! Homemade, wholesome and delicious. Not your average soup shop.

review_data.title: Not cheap but the soups are really good and it isn't junk food.
review_data.content: CHF 14.- is not cheap for a soup, a piece of bread and a drink but it is really good quality. I shall return!

review_data.title: Healthy and good soup!
review_data.content: A very nice and quiet place to get lunch or takeaway on your way home from work. The staff is very friendly and the service is high.

review_data.title: Yummmmy soups!
